column4: hello eveyone. I am using ndiswrapper to install my wireless ethernet card. After booting up i can't ping to other systems
ifconfig, route are commands helpful. also netstat.
after installing ndiswrapper and setting ndiswrapper -m. Is it needed to do all those things?
you have to investigate.  start with 'ifconfig' by itself to see if the device is there and assigned an IP address.
